pageContext.claim: “If we wanted to fight a war in Afghanistan and win it, I could win that war in a week. I just don't want to kill 10 million people. Does that make sense to you? I don't want to kill 10 million people.”
pageContext.analysis: This is a jarring way to talk about a conflict zone. Trump suggests he could wipe out almost one-third of Afghanistan's population, but that would be a shocking and unprecedented world event indistinguishable from genocide.
